product_overview: A platform enabling users to search, book, and review hotels and flights using local data with a simple authentication system and administrative controls.
core_goals: Enable users to log in using a secure test account
Allow users to search for hotels and flights based on location or route filters
Provide the ability for users to simulate booking for hotels and flights
Allow users to submit and view reviews with ratings and comments
Show users their booking history with detailed information
Give administrators the ability to manage hotels and flights by adding or deleting entries
Ensure the product operates locally with minimal setup without external services
key_features: Authentication system with hardcoded test credentials
Search functionality for hotels and flights utilizing local data
Simulated booking feature with placeholder page
Review system for adding and viewing hotel and flight reviews
Booking history showing past bookings for the logged-in user
Admin panel for managing hotel and flight data
React Router implementation with protected routes for navigation
user_flow_summary: User logs in with test credentials and gains access to main features
User searches for hotels or flights by specifying location or route filters
User views search results displayed as cards for selection
User books selected hotel or flight through simulated booking page
User submits a review with rating and comment for a booked hotel or flight
User views their past booking history to track previous reservations
Administrator logs in and accesses admin panel to add or remove hotels and flights
validation_criteria: Users can successfully log in and access protected routes
Search results accurately filter hotels and flights based on user input
Booking actions are simulated and reflected in booking history
Users can submit and retrieve reviews correctly linked to hotels or flights
Booking history correctly displays all past bookings for the user
Admin panel functions correctly allowing adds and deletions of hotels and flights
Application runs locally without errors and meets UI simplicity requirements
